message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'd only be able to go up to $130 right now.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $130, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $145?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $145 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $135, which is halfway between our last offers.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we meet at $140?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product and would be willing to go up to $138.
I can see you're really serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $142?
